name: v1.1.2
body:
CHANGELOG between version v1.1.1 and v1.1.2
53fdf29 tests: rework shellcheck errors
0fccf63 start: do not hardcode RgwPort
492a6a9 start: only start rgw in the container The demo container can now be bootstrapped with a couple of daemons where previously it was deploying all of them. In order to reduce the footprint we now run only mon,mgr,osd,rgw. So only the bare minimum for ceph-nano.
